Submodules

api.admin module

This module handles which models are added to the django administration page.

api.apps module

This module handles the initialization of the REST API and starts a thread for automatic event and metric generation every five seconds.

class api.apps.ApiConfig(app_name, app_module)[source]

Bases: AppConfig

This class specifies the configuration of storm’s REST API.

default_auto_field = 'django.db.models.BigAutoField'
name = 'api'
